posts.post_content:
I'd like to get one of the top 10 backs and not a HOFer (to keep price down a little). Based on a list of back ranking by rarity, here are the top 10 I'm talking about.

Grade in the VGEX or lower with no paper loss or trimming. Will accept minor creasing if not through the player i.e. corner creases okay.

[*]Broad Leaf - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Drum - Series 350- Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Hindu (Red) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
[*]Piedmont - Series 350-460 - Factory 42 - District 4 - State NC
[*]Lenox (Black) - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY
[*]Broad Leaf - Series 350 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Carolina Brights - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Hindu (Brown) - Factory 649 - District 1 - State NY
[*]Cycle - Series 460 - Factory 25 - District 2 - State VA
[*]Tolstoi - Factory 30 - District 2 - State NY


Based on the "T206 White Borders Master" excel file, here are the list of known player/back combination that fall within one of these backs and that I don't have already.

  * Billy Campbell - Ready to Throw
  * Tom Downey - Batting
  * Bob Ewing - Follow Thru
  * Harry Gasper - Follow Thru
  * Larry McLean - Catching
  * Mike Mowrey - Running
  * Rebel Oakes - Fielding
  * Bob Spade - Portrait


My birthday is September 30th and would like to pick one up or have my wife get it for me for my birthday (turning 31 this year).

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], with any available.
Bump to find some nice cards.
